name: Otus ECS
description:
Space shooter showcasing amazing Flecs library providing Entity-Component-System pattern. Source code available!

Credits 
  • Space Shooter Asset Pack by Gustavo Vituri
  • Starts - parallax backgrounds
  • Seamless Space Backgrounds by Screaming Brain Studios
  • Racing car engine sound loops
  • 63 Digital sound effects (lasers, phasers, space etc.)
  • Electric Sound Effects Library
  • Kenney Sci-Fi Sounds
  • Humble Fonts - Free by somepx
  • Enchanted Tiki 86
